Aziz Istanbul, I greet you with love. I greet you with respect. I salute you with my most heartwarming feelings.
Istanbul means Turkey. Istanbul means the Balkans, Europe, Asia, Africa.
Now the world is watching us. In the many friends and sister cities of the world, our brothers and sisters have been screaming for us for days.
Yalina, dolana, talana no they are walking with us. For days they are showing us for different places in the world.
They know that; how their heart is blowing in Turkey in Istanbul, the heart of Istanbul and Turkey is throwing in those cities.
Participated in a business roundtable w / @jimflaherty & members of the Ireland-Canada Business Association http://t.co/uCTyqCRhuC #cdnpoli
I said yesterday in Ankara; I say it again in Istanbul today; If you want to see a photo of Turkey if you have photos here.
Is the international media would hide in it? Come on, BBC, hide that too. CNN hide this too Reuters hide it too.
You have produced false news for days You have shown Turkey to the world differently. This nation not that like introduce to world by you.
If you are wondering what is going on in Turkey, look at Kazlıçeşme, Istanbul. Hundreds of thousands of people in this place are not burning down, not breaking and turning.
We say it in democratic ways, in places where the law allows us.
Today they called again and said to come to the square. I'm making a smart call. O my nationality please do not come to this game.
May 27 intervention, the deceased Menderes incident especially against this saintly national. This saint nation asked for the account in the ark.
February 28 made against the late Erbakan, this saintly nation asked his account of his account.
That is Turkey. Written and visual media, social media, I hope you do not mislead. But the truth is here.
Both the friendly and the enemy now understand that. Turkey is not just of Taksim, Kuğulu Park, Alsancak.
Turkey is Kasımpaşa, Üsküdar, Mamak'dur, Sivas, Kayseri, Erzurum, Rize, Muğla, Diyarbakir, Yozgat.
Turkey is not a country where international media organizations can operate on.
Turkey is the country of the Seljuks who gathered the whole Middle East under a single flag. It is the land of the grandsons of the Ottoman world state.
We saw the Arab Spring, now they say they see the Turkish spring. Hey unaware, hey ignorant Turkish baht in Turkey took place on 3 November 2002.
@XXLTVSHOWUGANDA you are not answering your phone!
The great leader makes great leaders, and does not reduce the institution in one person only .. # Book _ Flashes_from_ think
63 years ago, it was read as 'God is Uludur', with a depressing voice that crushed Istanbul's minarets.
In 1950 the late Adnan Menderes ended this great cruelty. In the minarets, the crusader began to read, saying 'I love Allah'.
I call out to very hard-hearted people: Mr. Menderes was very kind. You have taken this kind of person to i and you are asthmatic.
Now you are using it for me. We are the people who believe that death is the right and that no one but Allah can live the life that Allah gives.
We embrace our nationality. We are all in our nationality. Nobody will have the power to separate us.

Congratulations to Bárbara Riveros for her 1st place in the Ironman in Germany. Proud that he has placed the name of Chile so high!
You look beautiful, you think beautiful, you have shown us beautiful for weeks, you thought you were beautiful.
For three weeks in Turkey there was a totally different view from each other.
There was violence, anger, hatred on one side, peace on the other, brotherhood.
Our company is to cultivate volunteers. Our issue is to embrace the Tuna and the Nile with the Euphrates.
I wish our brothers and sisters from Turkey to make good trips. If you will be the light of the future, God be your help and support.

#EU is coming to this #G8 to promote a fairer world. Fairness at home in #G8 countries and fairness for people around the globe.
We want fairness by further opening trade between free and open economies. #G8
#EU just agreed a broad mandate to start negotiations with #US on Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership. #TTIP #G8
Interview to @CNBC at the margins of G8 Summit #G8UK @G8 http://t.co/HdLTYmsfsS
This summit is also about fairness in the way taxes are paid by individuals and companies. #G8
I expect this #G8 to give powerful signal we're ready to look for those who do not respect rules of the game+hold them accountable.
Thirdly, we want fairness through greater transparency on land governance, open data and in extractive industries. #G8
#EU has very good story to tell, often pioneering the global agenda in all of the #G8 priorities.
#EU has agreed far-reaching binding legislation for transparency in extractive industries and forestry.#G8
#EU passed legislation to further open up public data because we believe that open data means opening business opportunities+creating jobs.
#EU is world’s largest donor for development assistance, with a specific emphasis on food security. #G8
#EU is driving force behind the new political momentum in the fight against tax evasion and avoidance. #G8
Our bilateral trade agreements are stepping stone towards further liberalising global trade+strengthening multilateral trading system.#G8
In Europe and at global level, we want that everybody pays his fair share of taxes in a transparent way. #G8
Bank secrecy and tax havens will soon belong to the past. #G8
We've proposed a maximum extension of the scope for the automatic exchange of information among #EU tax authorities. #G8
We are convinced that there is a need to improve tax governance everywhere. #G8
I'm confident this #G8 will provide political impetus for global change towards more global fairness, including for the poorest countries.
Turkey was such a country that some international circles could write scripts on Turkey and successfully implement them.
The three lines of letters that appeared in any newspaper in the West were spoken in Turkey for weeks and the agenda was shaken.
We had an unreliable economy and foreign policy. We also had a non-self-confident politics outside.
When the European economy collapsed, while Japan's economy grew by 1%, our economy grew by 3%.
We are now one of the most robust and powerful economies in the world.
There is no Turkey to determine the agenda, there is a Turkey that sets the agenda.

Today is a special day for the #EU – #US.  #G8 #TTIP
We are ready to start the negotiations of a comprehensive Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership agreement. #G8 #TTIP
Our joint endeavour is about bringing growth and jobs to both sides of the Atlantic by boosting trade and investment. #G8 #TTIP
#TTIP is also a powerful demonstration of our determination to shape a free, open and rules-based world. #G8
We intend to move forward fast. Current economic climate requires us to join forces and to do more with less. #G8 #TTIP
We call on our regulators, legislators and civil society to play a constructive and engaged part. #G8 #TTIP
